response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. The product is valued at $1,200,000 to you, and we are eager to make it a part of your success story. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We understand the importance of making strategic investments, and our product is designed to provide long-term benefits that align with your business goals. Please let us know if you have any questions or require additional information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1100000}
